newsitem.title: USA: EchoCath gets second, broader patent.
newsitem.headline: EchoCath gets second, broader patent.

text.p: EchoCath Inc said Friday that it the company received a second, broader patent for diffracting Doppler-Transducers.

"This second patent is a valuable asset to EchoCath because it broadens the company's claims on an ultrasonic transducer technology that meets what diagnosticians have sought -- the ability to monitor and measure the amount of blood flow, rather than just blood pressure," said EchoCath's executive vice president David Vilkomerson.
EchoCath manufactures medical devices that expand the use of ultrasound technology for medical applications and procedures.
